name: Rhino Survival Simulator
description:
Survive the wild elements in this fun, high action animal simulator. The goal of the game is survival. Improve your hunting skills the more you play to improve your chances of survival. Take control of powerful Rhinoceros and hunt down the enemy animals. Other safari animals included are Lion, Cheetah, Elephant, Zebra, Rabbit, Eagle, and Warthog. Cool sounds and 3D animations included. This 3D Rhino simulator has been designed for all ages.

Game Features:

-9 Different Safari Animals included
-12 Bonus Adventures
-Huge Open World 3D Map
-Rain weather and 3 times of day included
-Upgrade your Rhino Strength, Stamina, and Speed
-6 BONUS Battles match ups


6 BATTLE MATCHUPS
Challenge your fighting skills against 6 different 3 on 1 battles. Be prepared for a fight for survival. You either win or loose.
HD GRAPHICS IN 3D
Stunning High Definition graphics bring this forest to life.
UPGRADE YOUR SAFARI GIANT
When you hunt, you earn meat units that can be used to purchase upgrades for your 3D Rhino.
HIGH ACTION GAMEPLAY
Fun controls and Addictive game play for hours of great animal simulation.
RECORD YOUR HUNTING VICTORIES
The app automatically records all your victories so you can see how well you have done. Show others how well you thrive in the wild


We are currently working on a multiplayer version so you will be able to challenge your friends.

Find us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames
Please check out our other 3D animal sims - Dog Survival, Dinosaur Eagle,, Owl, Cheetah, Lion, Wolf, Crocodile, and Polar Bear Games. We realize the app is not perfect, and we welcome your constructive criticism. At Wild Foot we are looking for things we can do to improve the app.
Please send your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com.
